system.effect: When the character expends a Fate Point to regain wounds, they regain 1d5+Toughness Bonus Wounds and removes 1 Fatigue (instead of just 1d5 Wounds)

description.value: When the character expends a Fate Point to regain wounds, they regain 1d5+Toughness Bonus Wounds and removes 1 Fatigue (instead of just 1d5 Wounds)
